purpose: To provide a centralized repository of resources, tools, and references for Azure OpenAI and LLM enthusiasts and developers

reusability: Serves as a reference guide for developers and researchers interested in Azure OpenAI and LLM technologies
limitations: Primarily a collection of links and references; does not provide executable code or direct implementations
